description: Let s = sum of digits of n, let t = decimal concatenation of n and s, let u be obtained by deleting all copies of the leading digit of t from t, if this digit occurs in s. Then if u has only zero digits, a(n) = 0; if u has leading digit 0 but not all its digits are 0, delete all leading 0's from u and negate the result to get a(n); otherwise a(n) = u.
